cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.11.0)
project(programs C)

# Auto-detected if Nim is in PATH
set(NIM_LIBS "$ENV{HOME}/nim-1.6.6/lib" CACHE STRING "Nim library folder")

# Enough for do build micro Nim programs
include(micronim.cmake)

# Generated by build script from each file in files.txt
include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/files.cmake)
